1: The recent research findings indicate that regular physical activity can significantly enhance mental well-being and reduce stress levels.
(1) Recent studies have shown that physical activity has little effect on mental health and stress.
(2) According to new research, engaging in physical activity can improve mental health and alleviate stress.
(3) The research concluded that physical activity is detrimental to mental well-being and increases stress levels.
(4) Recent findings suggest that inactivity is the key to maintaining good mental health.
